items.title: International gang sentenced for smuggling thousands of ants in Kenya
items.description: The four suspects – two Belgians, a Vietnamese and a Kenyan – were arrested last month with 5,000 ants.

items.title: 'World Cup can be incentive for Russia to end war', says Trump
items.description: 'World Cup can be incentive for Russia to end war', says Trump

items.title: Smokey Robinson accused of sexual assault by four women
items.description: The Motown legend is being sued for $50m by four women who accuse him of sexual assault and rape.

items.title: Sudan cuts ties with UAE over alleged paramilitary support
items.description: The army has repeatedly accused the Gulf nation of backing the RSF, something which the UAE denies.

items.title: Fear and uncertainty after strikes: BBC reports from Muzaffarabad
items.description: An Indian air strike damaged a mosque and some houses Muzaffarabad in Pakistan-administered Kashmir.
